value.stringValue: Please send invoice to the following customer based on information below
Requested Invoice by email to eval team

formulas.name: TrackingInfo
formulas.expression: "Tracking Info for returned Eval Request Sent"

fields.name: InstructionsAddress
fields.fieldText:
Verify the Shipping

Information


The default address is the Contact address but you can use any address.


Please use the Google Address Search Tool for quicker and more accurate addresses


**All Fields Required Except for State/Province Outside the US and Canada**

screens.name: Email_body
screens.label: Email body

fields.name: Body

screens.helpText: By clicking Next this email body will be sent to the Eval team.

screens.name: Email_body_1
screens.label: Email body

fields.name: Body_1

screens.helpText: By clicking Next this email body will be sent to the Eval team.

screens.name: Email_body_1_1
screens.label: Email body

fields.name: Body_1_1
fields.fieldText:
You have requested that Viewsonic pay for shipping and get tracking information to the customer. This request will be sent to the eval team once you click on next.


Return Pick Up address: {!street} {!city},{!state} {!country} {!postal}


RMA # {!RMA} and Eval Request Number {!evalname}. The products listed below are the products to be returned.


Notes:

{!Notess_0_0}

screens.helpText: By clicking Next this email body will be sent to the Eval team.

fields.name: What_do_you_want_to_do_with_shipping
fields.fieldText: What do you want to do with shipping?

textTemplates.name: Confirmation
textTemplates.text:
Please Confirm that all information below is correct before clicking next. This is the final step.
You can go back in the browser to update any information.

textTemplates.name: EmailBody1
textTemplates.text: Please send an invoice for RMA # {!RMA} and Eval Request Number text({!evalname})

textTemplates.name: Instructions
textTemplates.text:
Since each sku could have a different tracking number, you should enter all tracking numbers in the Tracking Number(s) field.
If you do not have any tracking information, please put no tracking info in the Tracking Number(s) field.

textTemplates.name: Subject
textTemplates.text: Please send an invoice for RMA # {!RMA} and Eval Request Number {!evalname}
